options.name: Action : Kinetic Shot
options.description: You fire energy from your Conduit by making a Projectile Spell Attack at a Target within 6 Units, dealing 1d8 Physical Damage plus your Spell Damage Bonus Modifier. This Action does not have usage limits.

options.name: Kinetic Force
options.description: The True Hit threshold on your Kinetic Shot is reduced by 1. Additionally, when you True Hit with your Kinetic Shot Action, you can displace a Large or smaller creature 1 Unit.

options.name: Free Action : Charged Shots
options.description: You empower your next Kinetic Shot this turn to become a Ray Attack that is a 1 Unit wide line, dealing Arcane Damage.

options.name: Free Action : Repeating Blast
options.description: After using your Kinetic Shot Action or Channeling a Spell against a target that has a channel time of 1 Action, use the Kinetic Shot Action against that same target.

options.name: Improved Kinetic Shot
options.description: The Damage on your Kinetic Shot is upgraded to 2d6 and the Range is increased to 10 Units. Additionally, your Kinetic Shot and Charged Kinetic Shot variant can Critically Hit
